greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of triangle A104505, which is equal to the right-hand side of the triangle A084610 of coefficients in (1+x-x^2)^n.
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(x/((1 - x)) + 1/((-Sqrt[5 x^2 - 2 x + 1] + x + 1)) x (1 - (5 x - 1)/(Sqrt[5 x^2 - 2 x + 1]))), {x, 0, 40}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 05 2015 *)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Mar 11 2005
